page.description: Get a form definition. Data includes the form commands which define the form structure.

return.name: result
return.description: Returns an object with these properties:

property.name: cmds
property.description: an array of form definition commands (these commands define the form structure)

property.name: mediafields
property.description: a list of the media fields in the form

section.title: Node
Xbasic
section.example: dim apikey as c = "Your_api_key" dim postdata as c dim url as c = "/GetFormDefinitionForFormId/value_of_formId" dim pr as p pr = a5dialogHelper_transformAPIQuery(url,postdata,apikey) if pr.error = .f. then dim result as c result = pr.result else dim errorText as c errorText = pr.errorText end if
